		
	ObjectMapper mapper = new  ObjectMapper();
	JsonNode readTree;
	try {
		readTree = mapper.readTree(new File("D://passwordPolicies (1).json"));

	JsonNode path = readTree.path("passwordPattern");
	JsonNode pattern = path.path("value");
	System.out.println(pattern.toString());
	} catch (IOException e) {
		// TODO Auto-generated catch block
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
